meanings.definition: The state or quality of lacking a specific purpose or goal.
meanings.sent1: The objectlessness of the situation left everyone feeling lost.
meanings.sent2: The objectlessness of the art piece made it difficult to interpret.
meanings.sent3: The objectlessness of the party planning led to chaos.
meanings.sent4: Her mind wandered into a realm of objectlessness, free from constraints.
meanings.sent5: The objectlessness of the empty room was eerie and unsettling.

meanings.definition: The absence of physical form or substance.
meanings.sent1: The objectlessness of the ghostly figure was chilling.
meanings.sent2: The objectlessness of the fog obscured the view ahead.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick created an illusion of objectlessness.
meanings.sent4: In the darkness, the objectlessness of the shadows seemed alive.
meanings.sent5: The objectlessness of the dream world felt strangely comforting.
